metadata.name: The Ringman
metadata.description:
*Generative art*
*Special edition created for the "Circus" World*

The Ringman is the person who organises and manages the show in a circus.

In a circus, the world that is presented to us is a mix between illusion and reality. During the show, the Ringman is the link between these two worlds.

This artwork aims to represent this duality, also presents in our lives.  

**Technique**

PNG format
3600 x 4500 pixels
Generative art 

Because I have introduced a certain amount of randomness into the algorithm, the output is always different. Therefore, this artwork is just one curated edition selected from a large number of outputs that I have generated using the same algorithm. 

Coded in JavaScript, using p5.js, love and a lot of coffee.
